scripts.fsw: NODE_OPTIONS='--no-warnings' USE_SAP=true CHECK_BKO=true USE_CHAIR=true FACULTY=FSW nuxi dev
scripts.farmacie: DATABASE_URL="mysql://development:secret@tapp_mariadb:3306/farmacie" USE_SAP=false CHECK_BKO=false USE_CHAIR=false FACULTY=FW nuxi dev
scripts.geo: DATABASE_URL="mysql://development:secret@tapp_mariadb:3306/geo" USE_SAP=true CHECK_BKO=true USE_CHAIR=false FACULTY=GEO nuxi dev
scripts.predev: [ "$DOCKER_RUNNING" != "true" ] && echo "Running dev is not permitted outside of a container!" 1>&2 && exit 1; exit 0
scripts.pw:test-fsw: DATABASE_URL="mysql://development:secret@mariadb:3306/test" SEED_FILE="/var/app/database/testing/data.sql" USE_SAP=true CHECK_BKO=true USE_CHAIR=true FACULTY=FSW DEBUG=pw:webserver playwright test --ui-host=0.0.0.0 --ui-port=3204
scripts.pw:test-geo: DATABASE_URL="mysql://development:secret@mariadb:3306/test" SEED_FILE="/var/app/database/testing/data.sql" USE_SAP=true CHECK_BKO=true USE_CHAIR=false FACULTY=GEO DEBUG=pw:webserver playwright test --ui-host=0.0.0.0 --ui-port=3204
scripts.pw:test-farmacie: DATABASE_URL="mysql://development:secret@mariadb:3306/test" SEED_FILE="/var/app/database/testing/data.sql" USE_SAP=false CHECK_BKO=false USE_CHAIR=false FACULTY=FW DEBUG=pw:webserver playwright test --ui-host=0.0.0.0 --ui-port=3204
scripts.pw:githubactions-fsw: BASEURL="http://127.0.0.1:3000" DATABASE_URL="mysql://development:secret@127.0.0.1:3306/test" CMD="bash -c 'tests/github_action.sh'" SEED_FILE="database/testing/data.sql" USE_SAP=true CHECK_BKO=true USE_CHAIR=true FACULTY=FSW DEBUG=pw:webserver playwright test --reporter=html --project=chromium --max-failures 3 --retries 1
scripts.pw:githubactions-geo: BASEURL="http://127.0.0.1:3000" DATABASE_URL="mysql://development:secret@127.0.0.1:3306/test" CMD="bash -c 'tests/github_action.sh'" SEED_FILE="database/testing/data.sql" USE_SAP=true CHECK_BKO=true USE_CHAIR=false FACULTY=GEO DEBUG=pw:webserver playwright test --reporter=html --project=chromium --max-failures 3 --retries 1
scripts.pw:githubactions-farmacie: BASEURL="http://127.0.0.1:3000" DATABASE_URL="mysql://development:secret@127.0.0.1:3306/test" CMD="bash -c 'tests/github_action.sh'" SEED_FILE="database/testing/data.sql" USE_SAP=false CHECK_BKO=false USE_CHAIR=false FACULTY=FW DEBUG=pw:webserver playwright test --reporter=html --project=chromium --max-failures 3 --retries 1
